short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inside Yak is a WebRTC client for PBX.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a WebRTC client for Inside Yak
It works using WebRTC & SIP protocol. It makes communication easy and cost-effective.

Key features :

-> Audio Calls
-> Video Calls
-> Instant Messaging
-> Conference
-> Fax 
-> Voicemail
-> Call Hold
-> Call Transfer
-> Call Park
-> Mute/ Unmute
-> Call History
-> Phonebook
